ca.projectTOMi.tomi.controller

Class TeamController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.projectTOMi.tomi.controller.TeamController

  • @RestController
public class TeamController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles HTTP requests for Team objects in the ProjectTOMi system.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Karol Talbot

public org.springframework.hateoas.Resources<org.springframework.hateoas.Resource<Team>> getActiveTeams()

public org.springframework.hateoas.Resource<Team> getTeam(@PathVariable
                                                                                            java.lang.Long id)
        Returns a resource representing the requested Team to the source of a GET request to /teams/id.
        Parameters:
        id - unique identifier for the Team
        Returns:
        Resource representing the Team object.

      • createTeam

        @PostMapping(value="/teams")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createTeam(@RequestBody
                                                                                           Team newTeam)
                                                                                    throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Creates a new Team with the attributes provided in the POST request to /teams.
        Parameters:
        newTeam - a team object with required information.
        Returns:
        response containing links to the newly created team
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when the created URI is unable to be parsed

      • updateTeam

        @PutMapping(value="/teams/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateTeam(@PathVariable
                                                                                               java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                               @RequestBody
                                                                                               Team newTeam)
                                                                                        throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Updates the attributes for a Team with the provided id with the attributes provided in the PUT request to /teams/id.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier for the Team to update
        newTeam - the updated team
        Returns:
        response containing a link to the updated team
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when the created URI is unable to be parsed

      • setTeamInactive

        @DeleteMapping(value="/teams/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> setTeamInactive(@PathVariable
                                                                                                       java.lang.Long id)
        Sets the requested team's active attribute false, removing it from the list of active teams. Responds to the DELETE requests to /teams/id.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier for the team to be set inactive
        Returns:
        a response without any content
